code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight x 7 weeks. he is a 52 year old white male swimmer. o:Height 70 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:a male swimmer aged 54 yrs presents with mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight. o:Height 70 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
